first_translate: siegren.

hangle: 설마 우리가 영원히 함께할 거라 생각했던 건 아니지?
first_translate: did you really think we’d stay together forever?
we’re both adults now.

hangle: 아무리 소꿉친구라도 이 시기가 되면 길이 갈라지는 건 당연해.
first_translate: it’s only normal for childhood friends like us to eventually part ways at some point or another.
hah...
you’re so cold-hearted.
I prefer “rational.”
do you plan on living in the capital from now on?
not sure yet.

hangle: 일단은 좀 따뜻한 곳으로 가고 싶네.
first_translate: for now, I just want to head somewhere warm.
I see...

hangle: 그렇게 서운한 표정은 짓지 말았으면 좋겠는데….
first_translate: can you please stop looking at me like that? it makes me feel bad.
you know we can’t act like children anymore.

hangle: 진심으로 나와 쭉 시간을 보낼 수 있을거라 믿었단 말이야?
first_translate: did you honestly believe we could spend all our time together?

hangle: 하지만 수도에 간다니까 시그렌이 이러는 이유는 짐작이 간다.
first_translate: but since he reacted this way when I told him about my plans to move to the capital,

hangle: 그곳은 자신의 목숨을 노렸던 자들의 본거지.
first_translate: that must mean his past life is still haunting him there.

hangle: 시그렌에게 수도란 고향이자 도망쳐 나온 장소이니.
first_translate: the place where people tried to kill him was also his hometown.
don’t be sad, siegren.
if everything goes according to how things played out in the novel,

hangle: 시그렌도 수도로 올 수 있게 될 테지.
first_translate: then you’ll come to live in the capital as well.

hangle: 어디에 있든지 난 항상 너의 편일 테니까.
first_translate: no matter what happens, I will always take your side.
let me know if you need any help.
I’ll always run back to you whenever you do.
and what if I ask you not to leave haillon?
well, then that would be impossible.

hangle: 네가 헤일론에 계속 박혀 있으면 이야기 진행이 안되니까.
first_translate: your story won’t progress unless you leave here.
except for that one thing,
how contradictory are you?
in which way?

hangle: 위기가 닥칠 때 도와줄 수 있는 친구가 있는 게 얼마나 중요한데?
first_translate: isn’t having someone by your side during times of crisis important?
fiona...
what am I to you?
well...

hangle: 이 세상에서 가장 소중한 존재로 여기고 있어.
first_translate: to me, you’re more precious than anyone else in this world.
then...

hangle: 내가 어디론가 떠나면 어떻게 할 것 같아?
first_translate: what would you do if I left?
if you ever...
...left me behind,
of course I’d wish you good luck while seeing you off!
and I’d rush over immediately if you needed anything!
that’s what friends are for!
okay, forget it.
I’m stupid for even asking such questions.
what?
gosh, it’s freezing outside.
maybe I should wear something warmer--
a maid said she washed blankets earlier today...
where did they put them again...?
fiona.
siegren...?
this feels strange.
even though he hugged me from behind,

hangle: 꼭 시그렌의 품에 갇힌 것 같다.
first_translate: it somehow felt like I was trapped inside his arms instead.

hangle: 어차피 이곳을 떠날 거면 그냥 수도에 있어.
first_translate: if you’re going to end up leaving anyway, why don’t you just stay in the capital?
now that I think about it, maybe it isn’t so surprising after all.
he has been doing this until now.
no matter where you may be,

hangle: 난 반드시 너의 뒤를 쫓아갈 거야.
first_translate: I promise I’ll find you wherever you are.
I remember making a similar promise before...
...in my previous life.

hangle: 내가 널 만나러 갈 수 있도록 노력할게.
first_translate: I’ll try my best to meet you soon.
I made a promise like this once before.
so...
wait for me in the capital.
siegren...
several months later
is that all you have?
yes.
I’ve never had much attachment toward material objects.
there are many people here to bid their farewells,
but siegren doesn’t seem to be among them.

hangle: 제가 떠난다는 사실에 굉장히 서운해 했거든요.
first_translate: he seemed very disappointed upon hearing that I was leaving.

hangle: 그거 말고 다른 말은 안 했느냐?
first_translate: did he say anything other than that?
only that he’ll definitely chase after me.

hangle: 원래 주인공이 안 하던 짓을 하면 사망 플래그인데.
first_translate: when protagonists start acting differently from usual, it usually signals a death flag.
that sounds exactly like him.
take this.
it’s a letter of introduction.

hangle: 수도에 있는 헤일론 저택에 머물고 싶을 때 사용하거라.
first_translate: use it if you ever need to stay at house haillon in the capital.
at the townhouse?!
my final payment seems quite generous.
who knows whether it truly is your last paycheck or not?
ugh.
alright, duke.
alright, duke.
thank you for everything.
very well.
as expected, abel is clear-headed even at moments like these.
be careful on your journey, lady fiona!
we’ll miss you!
see you next time!
huh?
abel...?
fi-
o-
n-
fio--na...?
it looks like he wants to tell me something.
fiona,
we’ll see each other again...?
haa...
all I wanted was a break...
why does everyone keep saying stuff like that?!
